title: SQL injection guardrails
description: Sanitise user-controlled input, enforce parameterised queries, and audit ORM usage to prevent SQL injection vulnerabilities.

title: Credential hygiene enforcement
description: Rotate shared secrets, enable multi-factor authentication, and store credentials in a managed vault service with least-privilege access.

title: Runtime hardening
description: Enable container runtime policies, restrict network egress, and continuously monitor runtime behaviour for anomaly detection.

title: Supply-chain integrity
description: Continuously validate SBOM components, track upstream advisories, and apply VEX attestations to prioritise remediation.

title: Infrastructure-as-code governance
description: Scan Terraform and Kubernetes artefacts for policy drift, enforce immutable infrastructure, and gate changes through policy-as-code.
